title: Quantum Nanochemistry Vol. 2. - Quantum Atoms and Periodicity
description:
Quantum Nanochemistry Vol. 2. - Quantum Atoms and Periodicity - Mihai V. Putz (AAP, 2016).pdf

ISBN 978-1-4987-2954-3

Volume 2 of the 5-volume Quantum Nanochemistry presents in a balanced manner the fundamental and advanced concepts, principles, and models as well as their first and novel combinations and applications in quantum (physical) and chemical theory of atomic structure. It exposes the atomâ€™s perspective of quantum structures, spanning its diverse analytical predictions by historical and in-depth quantum analysis of the atomic periodicities of the atomic radii, ionization potential, electron affinity, electronegativity, and chemical hardness, along with the recently consecrated electrophilicity and chemical actionâ€”as the main global reactivity indices are assessed when next judging the chemical reactivity through their associate principles
